–û–¥–Ω–∞ –∏–∑ —Å–∞–º—ã—Ö –Ω–µ–ª—é–±–∏–º—ã—Ö –∏ –ø–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–Ω–æ –æ—Ç—Ç—è–≥–∏–≤–∞–µ–º—ã—Ö –≤—Å–µ–º–∏ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á - –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–ª—É–∂–µ–±–Ω—ã—Ö –∑–∞–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫üìù. –ü–æ—á–µ–º—É –º–Ω–æ–≥–∏–µ —Ç–∞–∫ –Ω–µ –ª—é–±—è—Ç —ç—Ç–æ –¥–µ–ª–æ? –ü–æ—Ä–æ–π –∫–∞–∂–µ—Ç—Å—è, —á—Ç–æ —ç—Ç–æ - –±–µ—Å–ø–æ–ª–µ–∑–Ω–∞—è "–±—É–º–∞–∂–∫–∞", –Ω–æ –Ω–∞ —Å–∞–º–æ–º –¥–µ–ª–µ —Å–ª—É–∂–µ–±–Ω–∞—è –∑–∞–ø–∏—Å–∫–∞ - —ç—Ç–æ –∑–∞–∫—Ä–µ–ø–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è –¥–æ–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –∏ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –¥–ª—è –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–∞–ª—å–Ω–µ–π—à–∏—Ö —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç, –∏–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –ø–æ—ç—Ç–æ–º—É –º—ã —Å –≤–∞–º–∏ –±—É–¥–µ–º —É—á–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–æ –∏ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –∑–∞–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è—Ç—å —Å–ª—É–∂–µ–±–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–ø–∏—Å–∫–∏, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –ø–æ—Ç–æ–º –≤—ã –∏—Ö —â–µ–ª–∫–∞–ª–∏ –∫–∞–∫ –æ—Ä–µ—à–∫–∏ üòÅüå∞ü•ú

–ù–∞—á–Ω–µ–º –º—ã —Å **–ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –ü–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—é –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞ –∫ —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞–º –°–≠–î–û**.

–î–ª—è —Ç–æ–≥–æ, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –≤—ã –º–æ–≥–ª–∏ —Å–∫–∞—á–∞—Ç—å –Ω—É–∂–Ω—ã–π –≤–∞–º –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç, –∫ –Ω–µ–º—É –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∏—Ç—å –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø. –°–¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å —ç—Ç–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ:

2. –ó–∞–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ–º –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –ü–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è üë§, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–º—É –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø –∫ —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞–º - –§–ò–û, –ª–æ–≥–∏–Ω, –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è –∏ –¥–æ–ª–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å
3. –ó–∞–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ–º –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Ñ–æ—Ä–º üìÇ(–∏—Ö –≤—ã –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ –Ω–∞–π—Ç–∏, –Ω–∞–∂–∞–≤ –Ω–∞ –∑–Ω–∞—á–æ–∫ "–ì–ª–∞–∑–∏–∫" (–ø—Ä–æ—Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä) –≤ –ø–æ–ª–µ —Ñ–æ—Ä–º—ã)
4. –°–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–æ–≤—ã–≤–∞–µ–º –°–ó üñå—Å –Ω–µ–ø–æ—Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª–µ–º, —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª–µ–º –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è (–ò—Å–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä, –î–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä –ø–æ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–µ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–º—É –º–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–º–µ–Ω—Ç—É, –î–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä –ø–æ –∏–Ω–Ω–æ–≤–∞—Ü–∏—è–º) –∏ –†—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª–µ–º –°–ª—É–∂–±—ã –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª—è –æ–±—â–µ–∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã—Ö –Ω–æ—Ä–º

There are two issues that have cropped up this week which I'd really like Workplace to consider please:

Firstly, the ability for users and Admins to be able to delete comments in Chat in the same way that posts can be deleted.

Secondly, to have the option for anyone to post in a Group but for Admins only to comment.  We have an Ask HR Group where questions can be posted but we'd like only our Admins who are in our HR team, to respond. There are many responses being posted by well-meaning colleagues but they're not always correct.

Thank you.
Anyone else having a problem logging a support ticket this morning?  No matter what I type, I get a red warning with no explanation.

Hello.  We have recently run into a problem when streaming from Zoom to Workplace live.  When we click on "Live on Workplace by Facebook" in a Zoom meeting, there's a redirect to work.facebook.com (FB Work accounts).  Has anyone else encountered this issue?  Thanks.  I should note we are using Zoomgov.com.

# Naming bilingual groups

Probably mainly a question for Canadian companies or other companies required to communicate in multiple languages. **How do you name your groups that are meant for a bilingual audience?**

For the most part, we name:
```
*English Group Name / French Group Name*
```

But there is a **75 character limit** on group names which often causes issues given French is typically longer than English.

## Managing Default Groups

We have some default groups established to share important news to employees. We need all employees to remain in these important group and not have the option to opt out of the groups. I am inquiring if there is a way to turn off opt out options for these specific groups.

## Group Chat üí¨
# Hello Everyone,

Can I limit so only the group admins can send a message in a group chat ?

On the topic of groups, can I block people from exiting a group and/or a make warning pop up when they try to leave?

Is it possible for Admins to delete a comment in a Group chat in the same way that we can delete a post in a Group please?       If not, could someone report the comment in the Group Chat and could it then be removed as a reported comment?  We could really do with the functionality to remove comments made in Chat.

# New Toolkit! üè†‚öíüè¢ **Empowering Hybrid Teams**
> Hybrid teams (a mix of remote and in-person employees) bring with them a brand new set of challenges such as unequal visibility and access to information, lack of trust, and less opportunities to build personal relationships.

üë• *It's a topic hot on the agenda of many teams and companies navigating unfamiliar structural work territory. So we have prepared something we hope will assist you and your teams with carving out your unique hybrid work approach!*

The working habits that enabled high performing in-person teams won't necessarily work in the new world of work. Organizations need to foster new skill sets, behaviors and processes to meet the hybrid landscape head on. 
## üßëüèª‚Äçüíª This latest toolkit from the Workplace team contains:
* **A guide **outlining 5 key principles for hybrid team success
* **A customizable engagement kit **you can use to share hybrid best practices with your organization

üíªüì≤ **[DOWNLOAD THE TOOLKIT HERE](https://www.workplace.com/resources/toolkits/hybrid-teams)**

*Let us know your approach to this topic in comments and how you have leveraged the toolkit!*
> To get new toolkits, guides and engagement assets delivered right to your inbox, don't forget to **[subscribe to Workplace emails](https://www.workplace.com/subscribe-to-emails)**. It will also allow you to forward any assets to coworkers or external collaborators.

# Until we meet again

It's been a blast being part of the Workplace Community, but all great things sometimes only get better with a pause.

So today, I'm hitting that pause button. I have enjoyed learning from the community and engaging in conversations supporting others where I can. 

Divya Kukar and Camila Rodrigues da Costa a specials thanks to you for your support and endorsements. 

Until we meet again, take care and keep safe wherever you are in the world.

# üéâ5Ô∏è‚É£ **Workplace's 5th birthday is coming up!**
## SHARE YOUR JOURNEY since launching workplace

üëèüèº **#WorkplaceTurns5 **üëèüèº

*Workplace has been on quite the growth journey since launching back in 2016. *

Built as a digital* *communication tool, Workplace has been increasingly adopted to connect everyone in a company. Familiar features like Groups, Chat, Rooms and Live video broadcasting have helped many employees to talk and work together efficiently, even if they‚Äôre working remotely

*Did you know? **2021 is a special year for Workplace for a few reasons! ***
> Earlier this year [we announced that Workplace has hit a milestone of 7 million paid subscribers](https://about.fb.com/news/2021/05/workplace-reaches-7-million-paid-subscribers/), a 40% increase in the last 12 months alone. You can read more about that in this post [here](https://fb.workplace.com/groups/WorkplaceVIPs/permalink/2283099101822687/).
> The Workplace brand had a makeover! A fresh (more purple!) brand identity was introduced to help communicate a more mature and purposeful Workplace
> **October marks half a decade of Workplace being available as an enterprise ready communication tool. **

Workplace is thriving because of our fantastic customers, from whom we continue to take inspiration from and lean on for valuable feedback to help us develop the tool with new features. 

üí¨ **So to mark our 5 year anniversary celebration we want to hear from you! **üí¨ 
* What are the *biggest changes* you‚Äôve seen in your business since launching Workplace?
* What are some fun / funny ways you‚Äôve seen your employee community use Workplace?
* What Workplace feature or use case made you go ‚Äúooh, I didn‚Äôt know I needed that‚Äù?

üéâ5Ô∏è‚É£ **Please comment on this post with any thoughts on those questions **üéâ5Ô∏è‚É£

üå†üõ§ We hope to create some stories from your contributions to put the spotlight on our synergistic growth journeys, as part of the celebrations!

Hello everyone! I have a few questions about the **'Draft For'** feature which have come from people across our business and I can't seem to find answers to in this group or online so just want to double check if anyone on here knows:
1. Is it possible to put a reminder notification on 'Draft For' posts so that people don't forget to publish them? For example can people be reminded in 3 days if it's not been published by then?
1. Is it possible to see all your 'Draft For' posts across all groups in one place?
1. For any posts that have been 'Drafted For' which no longer need publishing - is there still no way to remove these unless the person you've drafted it for deletes it?

Thanks in advance!

# üéâüÜï **What's new in Workplace? September 2021**
> **Time for another Admins community digest summarising the latest Workplace product announcements taking place this month!**
## üìÑüìå** NEW WORKPLACE PLANS UNLOCKING FEATURES & FLEXIBILITY**

**[We announced new plans](https://www.workplace.com/blog/workplace-plans-2021)**:
* We renamed the Advanced plan to the Core package which remains at $4 per user, per month
* We introduced the flexibility to pay only for the additional features you need through Add-ons.
## üìöüí°**WE'RE ALSO MAKING SOME HANDY UPGRADES TO KNOWLEDGE LIBRARY!**

Read on for more details! These features will be available to all customers by the *end of September**.***

1) ‚§¥Ô∏èüóë** Restore Knowledge Library Categories Within 30 Days Of Deletion **(see screenshot)
* Our new Knowledge Library Trash feature gives you extra security when deleting categories or sub-categories.
* Deleted categories will now appear in your Trash and you will have 30 days to review your decision and restore the category if needed.

**[Learn more about the trash feature](https://www.workplace.com/help/work/1076305972751602)
**
2) üóÇ‚ùóÔ∏è **Priority Categories Expanded**
* Admins can now highlight more important content on Knowledge Library.
* The priority category carousel on Home will now display an unlimited number of priority Categories. This was previously limited to only three.

3) üîÑüó£ **Easily Move Between Language Versions** (see screenshots)
* People will now be able to easily see the language versions a Category or Sub-category are available in and choose to toggle between them.
* This will allow for people to view Knowledge Library information in their language of choice instead of seeing the default language of their account.

How does everyone manage reported content?

We have 5000 active users (10,000 employees in total), and so far nearly 600 groups.

Workplace allows users to report content without any commentary being added, so as SysAdmins there's very little chance for us to understand why the post has been reported, the categories don't give us any context.

I know we could give more people the content moderator role, but that's just more people with more confusion.

IMO, workplace needs to add a commentary section, so the user can tell  us why the content is being reported - also could mean we see a reduction in the amount of invalid reports.

Also, the reports should go to the admins of the group, as they'll be closer to the user group, and may know the context around what's going on.

Any advice you can give would be hugely appreciated.

# üìù Workplace plans are changing
## PLEASE TAKE NOTE OF THESE UPDATES
> üì© As an admin of your Workplace, you should have received an email today informing you about upcoming changes to your Workplace plan.

We built Workplace in 2016 to give the world a place to work together. Since then, we‚Äôve connected thousands of work communities and millions of people with this aim in mind. In the last few months we‚Äôve also released a number of new features to address the challenges of working remotely, like[ Knowledge Library](https://en-gb.workplace.com/resources/ways-to-work/employee-comms/knowledge) and[ Live Producer](https://en-gb.workplace.com/features/live-video), helping people discover information, work together and[ communicate](https://www.workplace.com/blog/business-communication/) authentically. We‚Äôve seen increases in[ productivity](https://www.workplace.com/blog/productivity/) and[ engagement](https://www.workplace.com/blog/employee-engagement/) as well as employee sentiment and retention.

We continuously review our plans to ensure our product offering reflects your needs. 
> ***The below changes will not affect your access to Workplace. All the features you currently benefit from remain the same as per your current agreement*.**
## üìå So, what is changing?

**1) You can now customize your Workplace experience **üé®

We are introducing Add-ons to give you the option to customize your Workplace experience. You will now be able to purchase an Enterprise Live Add-on and an Enhanced Admin & Support Add-on. Click[ **here](https://www.workplace.com/blog/workplace-plans-2021)** to read more. If you are an Enterprise plan user, you already have access to both these Add-ons.

**2) Workplace Advanced is now Workplace Core **üéØ

To support this change, we are renaming Workplace Advanced to Workplace Core. As an Advanced plan user, you will now see this name change in your Workplace. There are no other changes to your price or access to features. If you are an Enterprise plan user, your plan will be referred to as Workplace Core and will include both the Add-ons.

**3) Building for Frontline users **‚öôÔ∏èüë•

Workplace is committed to building the tools frontline users need to get work done, and we believe these features should be available for everyone. Over the past couple of years, we have launched frontline features such as Shift Cover, Areas and Access Codes to enhance productivity for your frontline workforce. To better reflect this focus, we will no longer distinguish between frontline and non-frontline users in our pricing and billing. You will continue to benefit from existing pricing until end of this year or any later period as per your current agreement. If your current agreement is scheduled to end on 31st December 2021, we will notify you about your new price plan in September.

In order to reflect the above changes, we will be updating[ the Workplace Online Terms](https://en-gb.workplace.com/legal/FB_Work_EnterpriseAgreement),[ the Workplace Privacy Policy](https://en-gb.workplace.com/legal/FB_Work_Privacy) and[ the Workplace Acceptable Use Policy](https://en-gb.workplace.com/legal/FB_Work_AUP).
## ‚ùìWhat do I need to do?

*You don‚Äôt need to do anything*. By continuing to use Workplace from September 2, 2021 onwards, you will be deemed to have accepted these changes. 

If you have entered into an offline version of the Workplace Customer Agreement with Facebook, then the terms of that separate agreement shall remain valid, and the updates to the Workplace Online Terms will not apply to you.

**Are Workplace For Good (WFG) Customers Affected?**

Per the current eligibility criteria of the Workplace for Good (‚ÄúWFG‚Äù) program, WFG customers will continue to be able to use Workplace Core for free.

‚ÑπÔ∏è **More Info**

Learn more by visiting our **[Newsroom article](https://www.workplace.com/blog/workplace-plans-2021)** or our **[website](https://en-gb.workplace.com/pricing)**. 

*Please feel free to contact the Workplace Support team via Workplace should you have any questions or for more information.*

# üõ†üé® **New Toolkits**: Share your Feedback üëÇ

We are planning to create on some new Workplace education assets, but we want to hear from you first to inform the direction of those:

Thanks for participating!

# **Mic not working in Workplace Live**

Hi guys. Some of my colleagues brought to my attention that they have sound (microphone) issues in Workplace Live with Multiple Hosts. This problem occurs after they've been in another meeting through **Zoom**. In Zoom everything was working fine; mic and earpiece. But the mic seems to be disabled in Workplace Live for several people.
We've tried so many troubleshoots, restarts, disables trough Task Manager...sigh.
Has anyone here met with this issue and solved the problem?
Any advice on what to do? Please help. I'm at the end of my rope.

# üéâüÜï What's new in Workplace? **August Releases**
## üîê** THE STAR OF THE SHOW THIS MONTH IS ENHANCEMENT TO WORKPLACE SECURITY**
* New Mobile Security Features
* WP Insights Improvements
* Profile Field Anonymization

Launching this month are new mobile security features and a **Workplace Security Whitepaper** and **Workplace Security Guide.** which you can **[find here](https://www.workplace.com/security)**. Read on for more details!
> Useful new features & resources? Let us know! 
## üì≤üîë** MAINTAIN CONTROL OF SENSITIVE INFORMATION WITH MOBILE SECURITY**

Several new mobile security features for Workplace will be available to all customers by early August.
* Keep important information shared on Workplace secure by enabling new **data loss prevention (DLP)** features on personal and corporate managed mobile devices.
* Protect sensitive information from being shared outside of the Workplace app by enabling block copy/paste, block screenshots, and block downloads.
* Ensure the right people are accessing your Workplace through App Lock, a biometric re-authentication challenge (FaceID, TouchID) when a user opens the Workplace app after a period of inactivity.

***Admins are in control of which restrictions are applied to which audience through the Mobile Security tab in the Admin Panel**. These features also integrate with your Mobile Device Management (MDM) provider to protect corporate managed devices. Mobile Security for Workplace Chat is coming soon.
*
Read our **[Admin Guide](https://l.workplace.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Ffacebook.widen.net%2Fs%2Fp7jjrdnbpk%2Fmobile-security-admin-guide_customers&h=AT3evPpNpuoizO4IlqtZ_yrNUJkD5L-hvxbbVCSDvHPjkOGqvYfYLeIVkUL1NErfcB3TPg9Efy9pfHZn2uhA4WEJ8dgEC9diUAo5J_HcpJ3hACqQt8At35o-PMF8hAThyl8BdnKy70nUP0YE1mkJ&__tn__=-UK-R&c[0]=AT20nZfNGgT0DliASvT_cF43td33cLIBFg_dGXnjJibmOxAVuCrGKctxYRLRHCj8k4LV4UHZCIssoJo1C6tA-Mb748F3_sgFyvsih4HYnk1zQ49OsHTW3jvXIejrHdmqO3QN0eNhEg1mR_M7BUyYqVgZHYL2TgnKbx4)** to learn more about keeping your sensitive information safe with Mobile Security. Learn more about how Workplace integrates with your MDM provider by visiting our **[Technical Resource Center](https://www.workplace.com/resources/tech/security/emm)**.
## üîΩ** **üìà**ADDING NEW DATA FILTERS TO INSIGHTs**

We are making the Insights panel easier to use!
* We have added filters that allow you to select data based on custom time ranges or profile fields as well as new sorting capabilities in tables.
* We are also refreshing some content and definitions we provide in Insights while keeping data intact so it‚Äôs easier to understand the data you are looking at.

To find out more about these changes, visit the [Help Center](https://www.workplace.com/help/work/322039169391242).
## üõ†üë§‚úñÔ∏è** BETTER CONTROL FOR DEACTIVATED PROFILES**

We are now giving you more control over deactivated accounts so you have options when employees leave your company.
* You now now have two options for removing deactivated user data: Delete User or Remove Profile Fields.
1. Deleting users permanently deletes deactivated claimed accounts. Deleting a user removes all of the user‚Äôs posts, comments, and messages, too.
1. Alternatively, you can now Remove Profile Fields. This option keeps the deactivated user's posts, comments, and messages, but removes their name and other profile fields.

## Workplace for Digital Dashboards

Anyone use Workplace to fuel content for Digital Dashboards?  Any particular vendors you use, and any advice you can provide?  Thanks in advance for your thoughts and/or experiences.

Hi all,

I would very much appreciate some crowdsourced wisdom. 

Our Vice-Chancellor (leader) has been posting a lot - mostly to relevant WP groups, but where there isn't a relevant group we've advised he post to his personal wall/profile page. 

His posts aren't getting a lot of traction, even though he is a promoted user. Staff also appear to receive email notifications whenever he posts. (A related issue is that, when you click through on the 'View in Workplace' email link, users are taken to an error page: 'This page isn't available. The link you followed may be broken, or the page may have been removed.)

There is a group our previous leader used for adhoc posts, and we're considering directing our current VC to post there.

These are basic kinda questions ... but what is best practice here? Does posting to a group achieve more views/engagement than posting to a profile page? And has anyone had similar experiences with those email links?

Many thanks.

## Admins Alert! Introducing... 
# **üë• üîÑ  [New Workplace Feedback Panel](https://workplacefeedbackpanel.com/recruitment/survey/20937?recruitmentCode=Ox9GoAl9MlDgjYHVPicE)**

üîé **Get involved in Workplace Research and shape the future of Workplace for your company**

üì© [Sign up to the Workplace Feedback Panel](https://workplacefeedbackpanel.com/recruitment/survey/20937?recruitmentCode=Ox9GoAl9MlDgjYHVPicE) by completing this short **[survey](https://workplacefeedbackpanel.com/recruitment/survey/20937?recruitmentCode=Ox9GoAl9MlDgjYHVPicE)** or by speaking to your account manager for more information.

***The Workplace Feedback Panel is a community of Workplace Admins and Users who help to shape new workplace features and give their opinions on future strategy of the platform. Powered by our research partner, FuelCycle, the platform allows Workplace Admins and users a forum to voice their opinions on what matters to them most. ***

**Why join the Workplace Feedback Panel?**
* Do you like giving feedback on proposed concepts or prototypes of new features? 
* Do you have ideas about ways to improve your organisations Workplace experience? 

If so then the Workplace Feedback Panel is for you...
> **We know from your feedback that Admins often spend hours having to refer & schedule users to us to take part in studies, taking you away from what matters most. By sharing the feedback panel with workplace champions from your business you can spend less time organising colleagues and more time doing what‚Äôs important to you.**

By joining the panel you‚Äôll have the opportunity to...
1. Voice your opinions on topics important to your Workplace.  
1. Get more out of Workplace by taking part in research studies and have the outputs of those sessions shared back with you to improve your companies experience

‚ùì **Frequently Asked Questions **‚ùì

**Who is the Feedback panel for?**
The feedback panel is for everyone who uses Workplace, we‚Äôre interested in speaking to people from CEO‚Äôs to frontline workers. We‚Äôd love to speak to a wide range of Workplace users, everyone has a different experience and we‚Äôre interested in hearing about them. By sharing the opportunity to provide feedback with your employees, you‚Äôll get insight across a broad range of users as well as early signal on what your employees think of their workplace experience.

**What does being part of the panel entail?**
We‚Äôll let you know when a research study goes live in the Panel but there‚Äôs no obligation to participate unless you feel it‚Äôs relevant to you. We have weekly discussion topics for you to chat with other panelists or you can opt in to speak to a researcher about your experience of a topic, don‚Äôt worry you‚Äôll only be contacted if the topic is suitable for you.

**Who are FuelCycle?**
FuelCycle is a trusted research partner who provide the infrastructure the panel is built on, their continuous research platform allows panelists to engage with us on research topics through surveys, discussions, forums and interviews.

**How is my Data Used?**
When in the panel, other panelists will be able to see your username, avatar and how long you have been part of the panel, nothing more. Any information you choose to disclose during studies will used by Workplace researchers only for the purposes laid out in the study information. You can choose which studies to take part in and can leave at any time. For more information on how your data is used please refer to the [Workplace ](https://www.workplace.com/legal/FB_Work_Privacy)& [FuelCycle](https://www.fuelcycle.com/legal/privacy-policy/) privacy policies.

# üì≤üéâüîê New Mobile Security Features!
## **LEARN ABOUT THE NEWLY LAUNCHED Security features for mobile & Security Assets **

You can now maintain access and control of your company‚Äôs intellectual property with Workplace‚Äôs new security features for mobile.

The features can be configured for the Workplace app on corporate devices enrolled in their **[MDM (Mobile Device Management) ](https://www.workplace.com/resources/tech/security/emm)**platforms, or for employees‚Äô personal devices through the Admin Panel.
> ***This feature will be available to 100% of customers by August 4th.***

The new features include:

**App Lock**
* A biometric re-authentication challenge (FaceID, Touch ID) when a user opens the Workplace app after a period of inactivity

**Data Loss Prevention (DLP) Features**
* Block copy and paste
* Block screenshots and screen recordings
* Block downloads

**Mobile App Management (MAM)**
* A new administrative layer in the Workplace Admin Panel to allow native activation of features directly to the Workplace app.

**Scope and Compliance Features**
* Audience selection based on People Sets
* Encourage a version of the Workplace app that supports MAM capabilities

# Suggestion for Facebook team: H2 heading style
## Reading text in "all caps" does not make it easier for the reader - research shows that our brains do not correctly process text in "all caps"

Is there any way that you could consider changing the display format of the "H2" heading for formatting posts? Our brand team has asked us to stop using it because:
1. It does not align to our brand (not really your problem)
1. It actually makes reading and comprehension more difficult (counter-intuitive for a heading)

Please consider my suggestion - thank you.

Hello,

Is anybody else having issues with using Google Workspace as an identity provider? All our users that log on using SSO provided by Google are having their Workplace accounts deactivated daily when the sync happens. We are having to manually activate and re-onboard them every morning. The accounts are functional and active in Google, and SSO is still working (they have no troubles logging back in again after the accounts are activated). Been happening every day since Sunday.
Does anyone know if it's possible to get an rss feed of all posts in a specific Workplace group so we can display them on our "intranet" solution? Thanks!

Hi guys. Today was the first time moving our **Daily Standup** virtual meetings from Teams to Workplace using the Live feature (With multiple hosts). We always start with a **Lean Coffee vote** so team members can vote with Thumbs Up or Thumbs Down on a meeting item. Will these icons (and more) be added to the *Raise Hand button*? I really hope so because it is a fast and easy reaction method for **Lean Coffee** meetings.

Hi, I know some of you closely watch  the groups and post activity.  What we are struggling with is the fact that people post in the wrong groups (although there is a clear group description and a pinned post at the top explaining the purpose of the group).  Then we need to decline the post and cannot give an explanation on the why it is declined.  It is time-consuming  and not efficient to get in touch with each user either by chat/mail to ask e.g. to move their post into a more appropriate group or explaining why the post is being declined.  

So here is the "would-be-nice-to-have"
* when declining a post having a drop-down menu with a few standard reasons why the post is not published : 1. please post into another group, 2. please add a short text to your photo/video, 3. this post is not appropriate for WP, 4. please contact your admin about this post,...

Would be happy to read your views! üôè

üôã‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Quick question - will there be any plans to allow groups with chat enabled to be added to people sets? Almost all of our groups have chat and it would be great to use people sets as a way of automating some of our admin tasks (particularly onboarding). 

Also, does this also apply to MCG; and being unable to add them to people sets? 

Does anyone know a way around this? 
Thank you!

# üìûüì≤‚úÖ **Get help quickly with 24/7 Workplace Phone Support  **
## Admins, did you know that you can now speak to support agents 24x7 with the new Phone Support service? 

When submitting the Ask a Question form, you can now request a call-back from one of our support agents.

Here are the steps you need to take:
1. Simply fill in the form and enable Request Phone Support and Authorize Recording. 
1. Once you have submitted the form, one of Workplace's support agents will call you back within approximately 1 hour. 

*Phone Support is currently offered in English (24x7) and Japanese (8am - 4pm SGT)*

Has anyone used Workplace to launch a big event before? I'm very interested to learn how you get employees to tune in, especially if it's a virtual event (e.g., livestream)

Hi All, just wondering if anyone has had any success creating a training event and linking it to a Teams calendar invite.  I copy and paste the link in and it appears in attendees calendar.  However at the time of the event, they are unable to click on the link to join the meeting.  

Thanks in advance.

N
Is there a "how to use workplace" guide for new starters that can be shared onto workplace?

Hi all, I have a bit of a technical question! 

Does anyone have any tips on how to modify a Powershell script to export the Bio field from users' profiles please?

We need to export everyone's Bio field (we're running a campaign where we asked users to updated their bio with a values commitment, and need to see how many have/haven't done it yet). I've found a Powershell script that exports users details (https://github.com/fbsamples/workplace-platform-samples/tree/master/SupportScripts/Powershell/ExportUsersSCIM), and I've got the script to run and export the data, but need to add the Bio field to the script. I can see from the developers pages that Bio is a field I can export, but I can't get it to export anything with the script. Any help would be appreciated!

# üîéüë• The Workplace research team is searching for insights from Frontline Users** **
## Help us understand how we can make Workplace better!

This research is focused on understanding frontline learning and development needs. 

***Admins, please spread the word for us to anyone who may be interested and meets the eligibility criteria!***
## WHAT commitment IS NEEDED?
* One 45 min in-depth interview 
* Scheduled between 19th to 30th July as per your convenience 
# üìÆ **[Sign Up Here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ejMdrv0RaZ9-96L-hqBqPiPTUQl7RFlPQhmQwtrYIQU/edit?usp=sharing) **üìÆ

üîë **Participation Criteria**
* Frontline end users (someone who spends the majority of their time not working at a desk, often customer facing or directly involved in manufacturing/ transport) 
* Uses the Workplace app regularly 
* Comfortable speaking English if possible - *if not simply put a note about the language spoken*
* Available for a 45 minute discussion anytime between 19th to 30th July

# ü•Å**What's new in Workplace? July 2021**
## **IT'S THAT TIME AGAIN! OUR MONTHLY ROUND-UP OF ALL THE LATEST WORKPLACE PRODUCT ANNOUNCEMENTS**
> **Please share your views as Workplace Admins on these latest announcements. All feedback much appreciated! We'd love to understand how you are using the new updates.**

We recently hosted our second virtual Transform event of the year based out of North America. With this event came several exciting product announcements across Workplace.

You can read more below or check out a quick üìπ **[video recap here](https://l.workplace.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Ffacebook.widen.net%2Fs%2Fftmqwl6prg%2Fconnecting-the-unconnected-feature-video&h=AT1is3qkX4B7cZg1cjQU-cyh9Gtsv5F2L0mQwHDEqmQJXm_db8iYW7sTcmOevByEBAXc2v77mV7uVpU0HAVLg3kO_Zr7LwnVJ8jfBSlCCG5Xk6Xt7EehyBEBVpOF0PL5w9_okzVMqlDcfkt9WR9v&__tn__=-UK-R&c%5B0%5D=AT27-_lZYq3ra5fVDEXFLUh5cl4knCpylV9FGp875xZkpRJIofqlBKyc8yRI9A9NNGJWygpUZumLs5ysglIcWCjBocXlgWT7NsK0ChdWcZukwWTZ-eFlZnRq1MxOsYQ5MAQn3I7frb32Vn30kbwgwMyA4aqqSW7wRIws87PcJQnLYcJNqN6LGnIFXxG6ujVDfhaCZa6ZUdZPIQufJw)**.
## üó£üìñ** ENHANCED LIVE Q&A EXPERIENCE AND VIDEO CHAPTERS**

The new Live video Q&A experience now has filters for comments and questions. This new functionality helps ensure that hosts don‚Äôt miss any questions, while also allowing everyone to follow the conversation.

We‚Äôve added the option to automatically create Video Chapters for your Live and pre-recorded videos with Machine Learning technology, so viewers can navigate to sections of the video they‚Äôre most interested in.

Find out how to create Video Chapters **[here](https://www.workplace.com/help/work/1397451513964579)**.

You can now join the open betas of both of these products through What‚Äôs New on the Admin Panel.
## üìö** BRINGING OUR TOP KNOWLEDGE LIBRARY FEATURE REQUESTS TO LIFE**

We‚Äôve made several improvements to Knowledge Library, many of which were top requests from our customers. We also launched a brand new **[Knowledge Library hub](https://www.workplace.com/resources/knowledge)** so you can easily deploy Knowledge Library to your org or, if you are already an expert, just hone your skills!
* Make your official company content more engaging with **Cover Pages for Categories**
* Unlock global access to company content by **translating category pages**. Find out more **[here](https://www.workplace.com/help/work/148007714055507)**.
* Track or revert Knowledge Library content changes easily with **Version History**. Find out how to use Version History **[here](https://www.workplace.com/help/work/1076305972751602?helpref=uf_permalink)**
* **Set permissions for Secret Groups** to view, or edit Categories in Knowledge Library. Find out more **[here](https://www.workplace.com/help/work/3068690163239606)**.
## üìëüïπ**SAFETY CENTER MESSAGE TEMPLATES**

Use pre-filled message templates or duplicate a prior incident to send the same message if there‚Äôs a ‚Äònext time‚Äô and even track safety responses on mobile. Find out how to create pre-filled message templates and **[duplicate an existing Safety Center incident](https://www.workplace.com/help/work/288662439060611)**.
## üë•** PRONOUNS ON WORKPLACE**

Express your identity at work, and help others know how to refer to you by displaying your pronouns. Admins can enable this optional profile field for their Workplace from Settings in the Admin Panel. Find out how to update your pronoun **[here](https://www.workplace.com/help/work/1690805331114733)**.

üóì You can click **[here](https://www.intern.workplace.com/workplace-transform-NA-2021?locale=en_US&draft=964091051060633)** to access recordings of **North America Transform** and other resources from the event.

# üë©üèº‚ÄçüíªüóÇüÜï Visit the [Knowledge Library Resource Hub](https://www.workplace.com/resources/knowledge)!
## **BUILD THE FOUNDATION WELL & REAP THE BENEFITS **

[Knowledge Library](https://www.workplace.com/resources/knowledge) can be used to do so much for your company.  Here are our top tips for how it can be leveraged for max impact!
1. Make your company's most important resources **available to everyone**- mobile, remote, and frontline employees included
1. Share **important guides for tools and processes** (i.e. IT Help Center Hub)
1. Create **powerful places for specific audiences** (People Manager Resources) or on **particular topics** (Remote Work Hub)
1. Give Teams and Departments a way to **collate their resources in a space visible only to them**
1. Create spaces for your employee communities to **curate and share their own resources** with members of their Group
## WHY SHOULD knowLedge library BE A PRIORITY?

‚úîÔ∏è It‚Äôs faster to set up than a traditional internet or wiki

‚úîÔ∏è It‚Äôs easy to control the extremely granular permissions

‚úîÔ∏è Anyone with a Workplace account can access it regardless of where they are or what device they use
## **WHERE CAN MY TEAM GET MORE INFO? ** 

Check out our[ **NEW Knowledge Library Resource Hub](https://www.workplace.com/resources/knowledge)** containing:

**12 new guides, classes, videos, and toolkits** !

...to help you through every step of the process: 
* from learning what Knowledge Library is and the basics of how it works....to how to leverage the APIs.
## üëÄ **[Explore the Hub Now](https://www.workplace.com/resources/knowledge) **üëÄ

## Quick question - Polling pictures

Hi everyone, in the latest UI update, did we lose the ability to add pictures to polls? 

We had a few folks in our organization that used the feature. I've been trying to nudge them over to a Virtual q&a format, but we're hearing some feedback that the q&a feature is too clunky compared to the poll/picture option. 

Thanks for your thoughts.

# How bots on Workplace can help with reopening üîÅ
## ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è Access our free Reopening Playbook ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

We know a lot of companies are in the midst of reopening, and with that comes many challenges for HR, Internal Comms, Employee Experience and Leadership teams.

To help we've put together a [Reopening Playbook](https://thebotplatform.com/reopening-assistant-on-workplace/), see attached PDF, that documents various ways bots can help with communications, operations and processes around reopening.  

**Examples include:** 
* ‚è≥ Pre-boarding information
* ü§î Answering FAQs
* üôå Day 1 Greetings
* ‚úÖ Entry checklists or new health & safety policies
* üìÑ Digitized processes
* üì¢ Company news and announcements
* ‚ùå Incident reporters
* üôã Leadership Q&As
* üòÉ Weekly / monthly pulse surveys
* ‚ù§Ô∏è Culture and wellness initiatives

If you want to talk more about how bots will help your staff with reopening then please feel free to drop a comment or reach out to us: hello@thebotplatform.com

Thanks!

message:
Hi,

I'm wondering what is this new feature. Does anybody know what it is all about?

# üñ≤‚ùóÔ∏èSpotlight on **Safety Center **-** **What are we building and why?

When an emergency arises, time is of the essence....
> ***So we are launching several improvements to help you send urgent safety messages as fast as possible and track responses even when you‚Äôre on the go. ***

 üìë ‚úèÔ∏è **1) Message Templates**: 

You can now save pre-written message templates, including recipient lists, in Safety Center that you can edit and reuse the next time a similar incident arises.

To help you get started, we have preloaded a few sample templates for you, including one that you can use to run COVID symptom checks as your offices reopen.  

‚ûï‚úîÔ∏è **2) Duplicate Incident*** (already launched): *

You can also also duplicate a prior incident, including the message audience, to send the same message again in as little as two clicks. 

Use this feature to set up a safety drill program and run the same drill on a recurring basis so you are ready when a live incident occurs.

üì≤ **3) Track Incident Status on Mobile**: 

We know incidents can occur at any time and you may not always be at your desktop when it does. 

Now you can track responses to your safety message on mobile.
## ADMINS, SHARE YOUR THOUGHTS ON THESE SAFETY CENTER UPDATES IN THE COMMENTS BELOW

Also, you can check out **Safety Center Interactive Demos** **[HERE](https://training.wplearn.com/.../UcJGwYF2Vpx6Lnnyfj9QUp9L)**

# **Introducing... üó£üí∏ The Workplace Customer Referral Program!**
## **NOW YOU CAN BE REWARDED FOR SPREADING THE WORKPLACE WORD & ENCOURAGING OTHERS TO TRY IT OUT!**

We know many of you in this community refer other businesses to try Workplace and we‚Äôre so grateful to you for introducing us to so many amazing businesses who are also Workplace customers now too.

We want to acknowledge and thank you for referring other businesses to us so we are excited to announce our **[NEW Workplace Customer Referral Program](https://www.workplace.com/referral?situation=other_MCG&source=MCG) **which we‚Äôll be rolling out, as a first phase, to existing customers and referrals in the following countries: United States, Canada, New Zealand, Australia, United Kingdom & Ireland

üé´** HOW DOES THIS WORK? **üí≤**WIN-WIN**üí≤
* **Referring Customer**: *When you make a referral to us, to say thanks, we‚Äôd like to offer you $750 off your bill for each eligible referral who becomes a paying customer through the program*
* **New Business**: The business you refer will get *Workplace to try for free for one month* and will become eligible to receive *$250 off their bill *when they sign up to become a paying Workplace customer for one month or more. It is at that point you‚Äôll both receive your bill credits.
## ‚úîÔ∏è** HOW TO GET STARTED**
1. If you‚Äôre an existing Workplace customer go to [www.workplace.com/referral](https://www.workplace.com/referral?situation=other_MCG&source=MCG) and add your name and email address to register for the Referral Program.
1. You‚Äôll then be presented with easy ways to share your unique link with businesses you want to invite to try Workplace.
   1. You can share a link, share on email, Messenger and WhatsApp on mobile.
   1. Or if you register for name sharing when you sign up, the business you refer can type in your name instead of using your unique link when they sign up for their free Workplace trial.

‚ñ∂Ô∏èWatch the videoüëáüèΩ for a walk-through of the customer flow referral journey!

üó£ We'll be doing a Live Q&A in this community shortly where we share more about this new referral programme, so keep a lookout for that!

# üí°üóÇüèÉüèΩ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èMake Your Knowledge Content Easy to Find, Even on the Go

**Access to more knowledge is something that enriches our working lives. This month sees an exciting new Workplace class launch focused on Knowledge Library. So we are putting a content spotlight on this feature over the next few weeks & sharing some tips for unlocking value from it üîì**
## **WHY BUILD A KNOWLEDGE LIBRARY?**

When you bring essential company resources together in one place, you can save employees time, curb misinformation spread and help people be more productive.

With Knowledge Library, you can create a central home for your company's knowledge content right in Workplace. 

Many already use it for:
* Benefits, expenses, travel policies
* Employee handbooks and onboarding materials
* Company mission and values, brand guidelines and annual and quarterly goals
* Diversity and inclusion policies and resources, health and wellbeing
* Team and department resources
## ACCESSIBILITY & DISCOVERY

üì≤ Knowledge Library was built with mobile in mind, so employees can access resources from anywhere. 

üîé Content is easy to discover through search, and can be shared with anyone using Groups and Chat. 

üëÄ‚úÖ Easy to manage viewing permissions means you can be sure people are only seeing content that‚Äôs relevant to them.

**Want to learn more? **

üìë **[Read this Knowledge Library basics guide](https://www.workplace.com/resources/knowledge/5-amazing-ways-to-use-knowledge-library?ref=AVvfaM5U4093RuNPLSlCnJYHDmPEIajccbuA-w1E97IW-N0WHvMXCRawKt36Act1Z1SJGUFjqShl5faqapBXH9JD9yn9hXq0QeZq8MV9A8yqBMeluFXnIpkxsadNyGoQRJmlUIs4mPzJrYmem9Ay4PIKNJ3bBowvc1t0YN9uFIteM7iBDEhFqFv-U5DUfqbDtdOM0EgXXe1p7mRVTHLqrCR7dU4Hb0XZHDCtPdVv-uPVDrht-fSWQuom-rWSh6z1qFrEyt1JBuRuBTwsufA88esKpg0NHi7d2N3OPqhdYjbu4LFMICTrtpjrihCsM7XS8gQ), **to discover how others use Knowledge Library and build the right content plan for your organisation**.**

# üéä Workplace Features just announced!

**Highlights from Transform North America **

Admins, here's a digest of the new product features that were announced at the North American version of our annual virtual summit yesterday.
## **New Features for Workplace**

‚ñ∂Ô∏è **Enhanced Live Q&A Experience and Video Chapters:**
   * Connect leaders and employees in meaningful two-way conversations when you go Live, through an engaging Q&A experience. New comments and question filters make sure hosts don‚Äôt miss any questions and everyone can follow the conversation.
   * You can add Video Chapters to your Live and pre-recorded videos with Machine Learning technology automatically, so viewers can navigate to sections of the video they‚Äôre most interested in. Find out how to create Video Chapters **[here](https://www.workplace.com/help/work/1397451513964579)**

üë©üèΩ‚Äçüè´ **Knowledge Library:** 
   * Make your official company content more engaging with Cover Pages for Categories
   * Unlock global access to company content by translating category pages. Find out more **[here](https://www.workplace.com/help/work/148007714055507)**.
   * Track or revert Knowledge Library content changes easily with Version History. Find out how to use Version History **[here](https://www.workplace.com/help/work/1076305972751602?helpref=uf_permalink)**
   * Set permissions for Secret Groups to view, or edit Categories in Knowledge Library.

‚ùóÔ∏è**Safety Center**: 
   * Use pre-filled message templates or duplicate a prior incident to send the same message if there‚Äôs a ‚Äònext time‚Äô and even track safety responses on mobile. Find out how to create pre-filled message templates and **[duplicate an existing Safety Center incident](https://www.workplace.com/help/work/288662439060611).**

üë•üó£**Diversity & Inclusion - Pronouns: ** 
   * Express your identity at work, and help others know how to refer to you by displaying your pronouns. Admins can enable this optional profile field for their Workplace in settings. Find out how to update your pronoun **[here](https://www.workplace.com/help/work/1690805331114733)!** You can also learn more about pronouns in **[this resource](https://www.workplace.com/resources/ways-to-work/pronouns)**

# üõéüíåüöÄ **Help your teams better connect and bond with Recess**
## Is it Break Time Yet?! ‚ñ∂Ô∏è ADMINS, **Watch the video for a demo of what recess looks like in action!**

**[Recess](http://www.teamrecess.com/) **is a new team building product** **from Facebook‚Äôs [New Product Experimentation](https://npe.fb.com/) team, a community of entrepreneurs at Facebook testing new standalone experiences. 

*In this rapidly ‚Äòremote or hybrid forever‚Äô leaning world of work, it‚Äôs harder than ever to make meaningful connections with our co-workers. Our interactions live in ‚ÄúCan you get this done by noon?‚Äù messaging chats and the countless fatigue inducing video meetings.** ***
> ***Recess is here to change that by giving your team a way to meaningfully bond without being another to-do**.*
> ‚õì **It‚Äôs fully integrated with Workplace and available exclusively to Workplace customers**.

üêª **WHAT'S THE UTILITY OF RECESS?**
* The convenient app experience is woven into your team‚Äôs existing workplace chats, empowering them to pop-in when they have a moment to de-stress and share.
* With thought provoking, fun questions, Recess reveals the humanity behind our corporate roles, giving your team a place to feel comfortable connecting on a myriad of subjects ‚Äì from their childhood dreams to their favorite foods. 
* Recess is also tailored to your team and welcomes collaboration, allowing you to set the intimacy level, plus inspires your team to create their own questions.
* It‚Äôs a space that grows as your team does, providing a whimsical scrapbook of quirky, collective fun that makes team morale not something you have to address, but something you can cultivate together.

**üîë GETTING STARTED **
1. Admins will first need to approve the Recess app via the **[integration library](https://www.workplace.com/integration?app_id=479178753383137)**. 
1. **Then teams can directly sign up by going to [www.teamrecess.com](http://www.teamrecess.com/).**

‚ùì** FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS**

‚öôÔ∏è **How does Recess work?**

Recess works by prompting new and interesting conversations between teammates. Though seemingly random, the question selection, sequencing, and design stem from behavioral science research on improving rapport and trust between team members. Questions are generally lighthearted in tone but teams have the option to increase the intimacy level or even create their own. Recess is fully integrated with Workplace and does not require the creation of a new account.

üë• **Who is Recess for?**

Recess is designed for highly interdependent teams 12 or fewer. It‚Äôs especially great for newly formed teams or teams with new members.

ü§ùüèº **Can I use Recess with two different teams I work with?**

Currently you can only use Recess with one team. However, we plan to enable multi-team membership in the near future.

ü§î **Where can I go if I have more questions?**

Feel free to comment directly on this post or reach out to the team at [recess@fb.com](mailto:recess@fb.com).

# Crowdsourcing Learnings Through MCGs

We want to celebrate a story which highlights the power of community sharing and support. It's why groups like this one exist!

Fabio Ribeiro, Business Analyst at Queensland Police Service (QPS), and his team have been building up expertise via community learning to launch their own bot. Fabio works on improvement tasks such as Stats, Licenses management, Bots, and other third-party integrations. 

Fabio has been posting questions and sourcing ideas from the Workplace Admins and Developer MCGs to build in-house development capabilities. 

ü§© A special thank you shout-out to Rikard Strand, IT magician (who wouldn't want that job title?!) at Cloudworks, who has not only responded to questions but also offered time to jump on calls to help Fabio and his team. 

**As a result of Rikard's expertise sharing and community spirit, QPS have been able to develop their very first in-house Bot and achieve many community optimisation project tasks via scripting!**

In Fabio's words...
> Rikard always highlighted not to be afraid to ask things, and of course, since then, I have been contacting him for advice to fix scripts myself. 

Some of the projects Rikard has assisted Fabio with: 
1. Removing people in Bulk 
1. Seen by List  
1. Exporting Post Activity 
1. Reading Group Content 
1. Post Analytics 
1. MobileIron vs Rooms issues on Corp iPad devices(Tech advice) 
1. Archiving Groups in bulk 
1. Comms BOT (their main project) 
1. Exporting Employee Data API 
1. Downloading Group Feed  
> *"Many of the scripts were amended to fit our expectations. Some were outdated, and Rikard was able to find how to fix it. **The main reason for the success was the patience and kindness Rikard has to teach/guide user like me that have enough knowledge to start to play with scripts but need a "mentor " like him to assist in achieving the goal.**  The GitHub repository is impressive, and the FB Developer have supplied fantastic tools to Admins."*

**Hope you take this as inspiration to carry on sharing and learning via such group-based expertise!**

# üéâ üÜï What's new in Workplace? June 2021

Here's your monthly update on the latest at Workplace!
## **OVERVIEW OF NEW FEATURES:**
* KL Hero Images
* KL Report Content
* User Provisioning Improvements
* Delete Users
* Export employee data API
* Update security reports

**This month there has been Knowledge Library improvements and several updates to Admin Panel functionality to offer admins more control and flexibility.**

**Read on for more details and let us know any feedback,**
## üå†** CUSTOMISE YOUR KNOWLEDGE LIBRARY CONTENT WITH HERO IMAGES FOR CATEGORIES**

Category editors can now add custom cover images to Categories and Subcategories on Knowledge Library to create a more visual and branded experience in Knowledge Library.

Go to the Help Center to [read more about hero images for Categories](https://workplace.com/help/work/572419446963367).
## üö©** REPORT CONTENT IN KNOWLEDGE LIBRARY**

Any user can now report content in Knowledge Library to admins on Workplace. Admins can then review the content, chat with the person who reported it and choose to hide the Category until the issue is resolved.

Go to the Help Center to [read more about how to manage reported content in Knowledge Library.](https://workplace.com/help/work/980242522134735)
## üì®** SIMPLIFIED PROVISIONING & INVITES**

We are making it easier to provision and invite users. You can now bulk provision accounts via API even for users with email addresses on domains you have not verified, including free email accounts. If you have verified your user‚Äôs email domain, you now can now customize the invitation email you send them and encourage them to claim their accounts.
Help Center info here - [provisioning and inviting users.](https://www.workplace.com/help/work/1173159049384822/?helpref=hc_fnav)
## ‚ùå** DELETE USERS**

Permanently delete deactivated claimed accounts from the Admin Panel. Deleting an account removes the user‚Äôs account as well as all of the user‚Äôs posts, comments, and messages. To prevent unintended account deletions we have added admin account protections prior to deletion. Accounts cannot be deleted within 24 hours of a password reset.
Help Center info here - [deleting users from your instance](https://www.workplace.com/help/work/392490647874724).
## ‚õì‚öôÔ∏è** MORE POWERFUL APIS FOR ADMINS**

The export employee data API will empower your organization to understand how your employees are using Workplace. For example, it will provide information about your employees‚Äô level of activity or interaction with top features on Workplace. Build and automate custom reports or integrate user level Workplace data with your own reporting tools using the export employee data API. Get started with the [API documentation.](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/workplace/reference/graph-api/data-export)
## üïµüèΩ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüìÑ** UPDATED SECURITY REPORTS**

Updated versions of our security reports are now available. Customers can find the SOC2 and the NCC Penetration test in the Certifications tab of the Security section of the Admin Panel.

Our ISO 27001 and our SOC3 are available to the public and can be found on the [Security and Governance page of the Technical Resource Center.](https://www.workplace.com/resources/tech/security/manifesto)

# Introducing a new Workplace brand identity

This has been a long time coming! We are excited to share the rollout plan for our new Workplace brand identity over the upcoming weeks.
## **WHY HAVE WE DONE THIS NOW?**

The time has come for the Workplace brand to get a makeover. We‚Äôve been moving quickly since we first started sharing this amazing product with you all to build work communities of your own. But our brand had fallen on the sidelines and needed a revamp to truly communicate our reason for being.

We are now ready to unveil our NEW fresh brand identity to help communicate a mature, confident and purposeful brand - to help represent Workplace as a dynamic and inclusive work tool with modern values that empowers everyone, anywhere, to feel the power of community within their organization.
## **WHEN WILL THE NEW BRAND GO LIVE?**

As some of you might have seen, we've already launched our new logo on the app screens. Today, until the end of the year, we start on a phased approach to rolling out our new brand at every touch point; from in-product (illustration, iconography), to our marketing channels such as email and social media, and of course our website.
## **WHERE DO I GO FOR MORE DETAILS?**

For FAQs on this rollout, please see [here.](https://www.workplace.com/workplace-rebrand-faqs)

We will also be sharing our new brand guidelines and details on how to access them here in the Workplace Admins Community over the coming weeks. Admins will also be able to see it on What's New in their Admin Panel.

Thank you for being a part of our evolving brand journey!

And a special shoutout to our Studio team all tagged in this post who led this work!!!

# **Losing a Group & Backing Up Group Posts**

Over the weekend we discovered that one of our key groups disappeared. 

4 years of accumulated posts were wiped out, creating a lack of confidence amongst our nearly 3000 members in some of the functions of this excellent platform. 

After doing our own analysis of the security logs we found that a single user logged in and then, within one minute, following their report of this (now deleted) group one of our admins accounts (who is also an IT professional) was accessed (without the instituted 2FA protocols being applied) and this effected group went into the digital ether. 

**This is deeply concerning for us and I wonder if other admins have had any similar issues. **

I have contacted Workplace Support and they were great up to a point where they seemed to just drop it with a standard reply saying that deleted groups data cannot be retrieved‚Äîproviding me with a URL link to a post that says the same. 

This raises the issue of being able to back up a group's data‚Äîthe ability to do so is not immediately obvious. If it is not something that the platform does then as this company's secretary and director I am keen to see how one can perform regular backups with third-party providers or otherwise.  

Following are amended screenshots of the security logs I was able to access. In the place of the names of these members I have numbered what appears to be the order of events that lead to this group's deletion. 

Thanks, 

Darren J. Doherty
Regrarians Ltd. (AU)

Ability to Completely Moderate Chat

There are times when statements are made in chat that need to be corrected or even deleted.  In my humble opinion, there are 2 people who should be able to be granted the ability to a) edit, and b) remove the chat statement: 1) The Admin, & 2) The Original Poster (the person who made the statement).

I realize that there are purists who may be enamored with a metaphor of speech, that once something is verbally said, then it cannot be unsaid.  However, this is not a verbal world.  It is visual.  And in a visual world, content is perpetually delivered until it is modified or removed.

Workplace should recognize this and afford this within the Chat functions.  If the metaphor in chat is to reflect an auditory or verbal communication, then it fails to be true to the medium.

# Tracking link clicks or referrer to Workplace content

In lieu of an email marketing tool, does anyone have any suggestions on tracking clicked on links to content on Workplace? It would be great to see how many people are clicking the links to open Workplace content vs. navigating to it directly. 

This is possible with Google Analytics on typical websites, but I'm not sure if it's possible to do this on Workplace. For example, with GA I could simply add a query string to the links in my email and then check in GA how many times that link was opened in. 

Ideas?

# What's new in Workplace? May 2021
## **HIGHLIGHTS FROM TRANSFORM EMEA**

üéâ Our **[annual Transform event series](https://l.workplace.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fgo.facebookinc.com%2Fworkplace-transform-emea-2021&h=AT3vc-aXE5DFJbewxYmatt1ydSq32uNiDjjdEuiTn_NsmcWEFOLuTMqbKnGo-cNxnrJnE4AbIukY74Gm16EJ85SwroBo6-TtsQSebOGb76gIA1qNI2ifg_BB2_6c7ulEEhDBW84FcFhetjHOQutA&__tn__=-UK-R&c[0]=AT0TRjbjhVjogXEZv5C_LaWuooS6ecmGXYrNSPY3b3Jso33QbUH5meOFdgjQzQC4B9hpFx6_iDBbPHcJErrkg6I1vSfv3ISNRvksebytV70S1FSSImIo0AJPI53R1K6nszqER18DCjoyYmaWgDqLWyAseVcKRcaLkr19yYJ7QtU0wwBCvOkKSb-v00qcO-t4fnmOKxkQmdofPdX9JA)** kicked off yesterday! Hope many of you were able to virtually join the first EMEA event. We made several product announcements there, many of which will be launching on Workplace this month.

*Read on to learn more about what was announced plus a couple of other improvements that are now available. *

***Thoughts on these releases?!***
## üì®** **üîÅ** SHARE WORKPLACE CONTENT TO OTHER PLATFORMS**

Our Plugins feature lets you securely share Workplace content to your internal websites or intranet, and to other platforms like SharePoint. This can make important information easier to find, increase your content's reach and drive Workplace engagement.

Go to the [Help Center](https://www.workplace.com/help/work/1142021159590378) to find out more about Plugins.
## üí¨‚ùì**ACCESS ENHANCED LIVE Q&A**

Empower leaders and employees to engage in two-way conversations through our enhanced, highly interactive Q&A experience on Live.

All hosts in a Multi Person Live will be able to respond to questions by bringing them into the center of the screen - both for hosts and viewers. And once a question is answered it can be marked as such.
## üó£üåü** BETTER EXPRESS YOURSELF AT WORK**

Workplace is launching two new features to help you better express yourself and your identity at work.
1. You can now **set a default skin tone** for your emojis that best reflects you by going to the emoji picker on any post and clicking the gear icon to choose your tone.
1. You can also add your **name pronunciation on your profile **to let your coworkers know how to say your name correctly. Navigate to the About section on your profile to set this up.
## üóì‚õì** A NEW CALENDAR INTEGRATION FOR EVENTS**

Our Events Calendar integration gives users the ability to sync Workplace events with third party calendars, including Outlook and Gmail. This will ensure people never miss important events happening on Workplace because they can see a consistent view of their day, in whatever tool they‚Äôre using.

Events Calendar integration works by sending emails with events as attachments (e.g. ics files) to anyone invited to an event, leveraging the attendees‚Äô email address on Workplace.
## üóë** **‚ùóÔ∏è‚ùå** DELETING SAFETY CENTER INCIDENTS**

We‚Äôre giving Safety Operators more control over the messages they send in Safety Center by allowing them to delete messages once an incident has closed. When the incident is deleted all Safety Operators who were assigned to that incident will receive an email recap describing the incident. Once an incident is deleted the content cannot be retrieved in the future.
## üìåüì∞** PINNED TOPICS**

We are now giving group admins more control over Topics in the groups they manage. Group admins can now create or promote existing Topics into Pinned Topics, remove Pinned Topics or deactivate Pinned Topics for a given group. We hope this will make topics easier to use and more customizable by group.
## ‚öôÔ∏èüîõ** GO LIVE FROM WEBEX MEETINGS**

Existing Webex customers can now go live from their Webex meeting to everyone on Workplace with a seamless experience. Start broadcasting on Workplace from Webex with just a few simple steps. Go to the Help Center to learn more.

# üöÄ Workplace is really taking off üöÄ

Workplace Admins - we want to share some exciting news!

Earlier this week Mark Zuckerberg [broke the news](https://www.facebook.com/zuck/posts/10112943025779381) that Workplace has reached 7M paid subscribers via a Facebook post, alongside a [blog](https://l.workplace.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fabout.fb.com%2Fnews%2F2021%2F05%2Fworkplace-reaches-7-million-paid-subscribers%2F&h=AT24JRaqmOLJ2ayi79HC3rENEMM9oMja1BUiJGrMCTH-j1MjaXihd9ka4_rsmL26NHnQbx4z5XtME54iq1zcvWuHAf1MCKcPcKoiE27bo1_6rDteAPHT8s-Cj5PtYYi6HobGHThN2CMEgVAazoqw&__tn__=-UK-R&c%5B0%5D=AT1rkE24Vmnq0AdPpZfyoEoQuXM6CLcXuRBVtOiUwsg9Uw6Z7w3nF1DJ62at7rJwEYtadObxRGkj58yR9BTBqzgxBCF1lcrpf1G28zkInxWkFYmQ1R3mdBAi6oBo95yYqJgkkTgKKiL9hwXpVFzeIo5zcd_595fRYBk) on the Facebook Newsroom. 

This is a 40% increase in the last 12 months, testament to the value this platform brings and also to the evolution of work; that tools like Workplace are strong digital connections builders, especially important now remote working is an accepted norm.

üíùü§© We couldn't have reached this milestone without all of your support and endorsement of Workplace so a massive THANK YOU!

story: Navid Saeed asked a question in Workplace Admins Community.

message:
# Practical recommendations to get more value from Workplace

Participate in the üåç Global Social Collaboration Maturity Scan 2021 and get a free report with personalised recommendations. üëå

Last year organisations from 13 countries representing 1.5 million users participated in this research. You can find that report attached to this post. This year we‚Äôre scaling the research further.

The survey audits the way your organisation is using social platforms and the value they deliver, it shows the level of maturity, and it offers recommendations to help you get more value from the platform.

You‚Äôll get recommendations on 7 levels:
1. üìà Leadership ‚Äì What should you focus on to increase leadership participation and engagement with leadership?
1. üì¢ Communications ‚Äì Is the communications department getting maximum value from the platform? What can they do to get even better?
1. üí°Innovation ‚Äì What can be done to further cultivate an innovative culture?
1. üéì Communities ‚Äì Do people connect around key knowledge themes on Workplace?
1. ‚öíÔ∏è Teams ‚Äì Are teams using collaboration technology in an effective way?
1. üë©üèª‚Äçüíº Employees ‚Äì Do employees use Workplace to get work done and to access the collective intelligence of all other colleagues?
1. üìû Functions (HR, IT, etc.) ‚Äì Are the functions using Workplace to better support employees in the organization? How can they get more out of the platform?

Participants get results and recommendations ‚òëÔ∏è directly after completing the survey and will get a full industry report just before summer üåª.

The survey runs until may 14th. **[Participate here](https://scan.orangetrail.com/).**
story: Jaap Linssen asked a question in Workplace Admins Community.

message:
Is anybody else having issues with Internet Explorer's new automatic redirection of certain sites, including Workplace, to Edge? We just started rolling out a new Windows update and we're finding that the redirect is not working properly.

Our URL https://cibc.workplace.com doesn't redirect and instead displays https://cibc.workplace.com/work/landing/input/ with a message of "CIBC is on Workplace. Join or log in using a business email." but there's no way to log in. The old URL, https://cibc.facebook.com redirects properly but nobody knows about that URL since we updated all of our links.

Fortunately, this version of Windows has only been pushed to our head office employees so far and they all have Chrome as their default so few people have encountered the error yet but we're about to push this to tens of thousands of more employees all of whom have IE11 as their default.

My gut instinct is that the problem is that facebook.com is explicitly in Microsoft's XML file (https://edge.microsoft.com/neededge/v1) but workplace.com is not. I think workplace.com needs to be added to the XML list.

Thanks for any suggestions you can offer.

Rahul Gilani FYI
Hi all - does anyone know the correct size for a banner image on a Note (previously a doc)? We've tried a few different sizes but it keeps cutting off some of the wording on the image. Thanks!

But where the input field should be, there is a message ‚Äúyou can‚Äôt send a message to this user‚Äù.

We‚Äôre a small dog rescue in the west of Ireland who have recently introduced Workplace for our team of staff and volunteers. Everyone is loving it but we don‚Äôt seem to have cracked ‚Äònotifications‚Äô. It seems to be hit and miss as to whether we get notifications for groups that we‚Äôre in and we‚Äôve had to start tagging and following everyone to lessen the risk of missing something. Any one else experience this and any tips to resolve the issue?

Hi, we are looking for the ability to select a certain region of a Doc and show them at different post entries in the group. 

So we can just update 1 document, these post will reflect the changes to those region automatically and in real-time.

Will workplace consider looking into this?

It will help us in the scenario where we have an equipment tech rider. We will select a region each specifically for Sound Dept, Lighting Dept and Video Dept.

So under their post meant for them, they will only see that region that they focus on, updated live.
Is it possible to turn off the functionality for all Staff to be able to create Secret Groups (or remove the option for Secret Groups altogether)?

# **Knowledge Library! **

Our company is really loving the Knowledge Library and are so glad it exists. I am sure everyone is using this tool differently, but for us there are a couple of functionality requests that would really help us out...
1. The ability to schedule new posts or updates to be posted, so we are able to do things in advance of launch dates.
1. The ability to archive or hide categories or subcategories.
1. The ability to share with a secret Group.
1. The ability to recategorize or move existing posts. 

If I should be submitted product request elsewhere, please let me know! Thanks!

ps. If you can do any of these things, please let me know!

**WHAT IS 'INSIGHTS'?**

Insights is a section of the Admin Panel that helps you track, measure and understand how people are using Workplace.

**WHY USE INSIGHTS?**
* Track how active your organization is on Workplace. Visualize how many invited employees have joined, how many are active, and which apps or platforms they‚Äôre using the most
* Understand how much content your organization is creating, how many people are actively contributing, and who your top contributors are
* Explore data on group creation, settings, and your most active groups
* Machine learning provides sentiment analysis on individual posts. Find data on the consumption of posts over time and total post consumption
* Identify where collaboration is happening on Workplace based on the interactions between people

**TOP TIPS TO BOOST YOUR METRICS:**
1. *For low monthly active people:*
* Host a monthly Live Q&A with execs
* Move all company announcements to Workplace and use your other channels, like email, to inform staff when announcements are made, linking them to Workplace to find out more.
* Make Workplace the default homepage on all computers. Seeing conversations and collaboration on Workplace will encourage more people to jump in and get involved

   2.*  Low content production:*
* Have champions create open feedback and announcement groups for their teams and departments and encourage them to post in them regularly.
* Create a company-wide group where employees can share news, market trends, opinion pieces and other industry-related blurbs with one another.
* Create a designated group where employees feel empowered and encouraged to share brilliant ideas and helpful criticisms. Groups like ‚ÄúProduct Feedback‚Äù and ‚ÄúBig Ideas‚Äù can engage employees and help you get valuable feedback.

    3.*  Low engagement on Workplace posts:*
* Format your posts: People are generally put off by large blocks of text. Try adding headers, bullet points, bold and italic text, and even emojis and gifs to make your posts more readable and engaging.
* Add images and videos: Visuals will catch the eye, use them often to get people's attention
* Take the Advanced Theories of Postology self-paced course to learn more best practices for posting on Workplace
> AND FOR MORE TIPS ON GETTING THE MOST OUT OF THE INSIGHTS SECTION OF THE ADMIN PANEL, **JOIN THE LIVE TRAINING "SHOW ME THE DATA"! **üëâüèº **[REGISTER HERE](https://l.workplace.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Ftraining.wplearn.com%2Fstudent%2Fall_events&h=AT0uDv29ptj7jftNW7iOhtl8retVOOa7H-ssTdZgcuhWa4AcNNm2QQ2H4envcVwQ7qS_BCkzPDdMhk5KLffRAx_pTBrFGlJ8eFKyyICP4AH8tobfGPojOf2up15wtDeGEi010xk1q9qNDm3Zmx17&__tn__=-U-UK-R&c[0]=AT3OLkYRG4SGljNCo7zuP_32TI4XtFlVXmCEhsaPFBfeDM2qZSzNKL0ylz4c5bQsnPIUY-WiqiNJsLCW7p4i3RsveftOI0ITtDNmSwMdiSp4lEfXwoA3at53BM6DU1geJ8PP6RIq9cIcRdpQ3ZG697L8BFQxWts6-ukfQXenUxmb65ibIeSpOi-A8pXdSXRGpll8) **üëàüèº

# **Overload of Comms on Workplace: are you feeling it too? How to manage it?**

Dear community, lately we have been noticing a significative reduction of people using WP... we asked the opinion of our employees and the main complains are:
* amount of groups: very often we have new groups created by enthusiastic people who wants to communicate their initiative/project and to compete for attention / number of members. 
* overwhelmed feeling caused by the amount of posts/notifications: people don't know where to find relevant info or feel that they need to spend a long time searching for what it's important as they're included in too many groups and don't want to spend time managing their notifications.  

Does anyone could share a similar experience and which solution or ideas have implemented to solve? I will share below in the comments what we are testing around here. 

Thank you so much in advance!
Hello! Have membership options changed for open groups? Suddenly, our open groups seem to require membership approvals. Previously, anyone could join without an admin needing to approve.

# Closing, merging and updating groups

We have around 400 groups in our Workplace to cover the work done by 38 national teams, and nearly 300 local offices. Because our work and team structure shifts and changes quite a bit, we often have to close groups, and manually merge them with others to reflect new teams. 

There are a few potential Workplace features that would make this sort of thing easier: 

* Redirects - if a group is superseded by a new one, it would be amazing to make sure anyone who comes to the old group via a link is redirected to the new one
* Merges - at the moment if we want to combine groups we download the emails of the members of one group, and the manually add them to a new group, it would be great if this could be automated.  

Would be interested to hear from anyone else who found ways to deal with shifting and changing groups, and has found ways to keep them up to date.

# üí¨ **Automatic Captions** [#FeatureSpotlight](https://fb.workplace.com/hashtag/featurespotlights?__eep__=6&__gid__=2551666451815103)
## It's time for another feature deep dive!
> ‚¨áÔ∏è** **‚ñ∂Ô∏è** **Admins, for a quick summary of this feature, watch the video below üëá. You can** [download the automatic captions video](https://l.workplace.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Ffacebook.widen.net%2Fview%2Fvideo%2Ftivan17arx%2FFeature-Explainer---Automatic-Captions_CE%3Ft.download%3Dtrue%26x.share%3Dtrue%26x.portal_shortcode_generated%3Doprcvt0x%26x.app%3Dportals&h=AT2yp24T8iQEhiGfCgnDG_iRdJD6W7hOBxUuDf_2k62h4khR6dgp1QjDB7xEMuEFnIqVO_hDG3BEXtlB6LsyI3Z5y6yAJOWoPQ4KKuawPfVkof2xJC_ltdWpkNXPuhRL9bQMWuzPnzsaHCqMtQLB&__tn__=-U-UK-R&c%5B0%5D=AT0w8ckmyaxB6h6WtQ9r-o0ucZUG6a9-jDVaDUkGOWXw1AtOE9PYL3B7Z7IJWpN4iZ2QDyGahf-y7kogLGDMDBaAfSkX9Lx2KEt0yNxZC8taMuxjSTpdZk6UFTKBvTo3Ip2jomhpW4czOMAgIxjAdemrndV5LCeC4jGWV7K9ZkFifRg)[ ](https://l.workplace.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Ffacebook.widen.net%2Fview%2Fvideo%2Fldod17wup5%2FFeature-Explainer---People-Sets_CE%3Ft.download%3Dtrue%26x.share%3Dtrue%26x.portal_shortcode_generated%3Doprcvt0x%26x.app%3Dportals&h=AT3w8cUhhchWjtGBBr98SrA3fVsomTnnxmLA8JgwhNLmGTwhxA_5FztZKCFXssm1BdB6zpcWIiJX-jVYdSoYOrkz2hbq6MPLP-_5YZTTLPtUgxV7j2NPXuu0TpJ1JptCRrtoyGGlfRAtYgfo8vNa&__tn__=-U-UK-R&c%5B0%5D=AT0w8ckmyaxB6h6WtQ9r-o0ucZUG6a9-jDVaDUkGOWXw1AtOE9PYL3B7Z7IJWpN4iZ2QDyGahf-y7kogLGDMDBaAfSkX9Lx2KEt0yNxZC8taMuxjSTpdZk6UFTKBvTo3Ip2jomhpW4czOMAgIxjAdemrndV5LCeC4jGWV7K9ZkFifRg)**included in this post to share with your own Workplace community. 
> üí¨ Check out this related Self-Learning module, **[Caption the World](https://training.wplearn.com/.../NHzFcCQ3QrbSAXD5eg6F8WV1)**

‚öôÔ∏è **WHAT ARE AUTOMATIC CAPTIONS?**

Automatic captions uses AI technology to generate captions for live and pre-recorded videos shared on Workplace.

üîë **WHY USE AUTOMATIC CAPTIONS?**
* Captions make your videos more accessible to people with hearing impairments
* Captions make videos easier to consume for those working on the frontline or people who simply can't have their sound on.
* Caption translations allow people to watch and engage with video content in other languages.

üí° **TOP TIPS FOR USING AUTOMATIC CAPTIONS**
1. For pre-recorded videos, make sure to check the captions and correct any issues before sharing the video post.
1. For live automatic captions, go back to the post after the Live video is posted and re-generate captions to correct issues and generate caption translations.
1. If you want to translate your captions to a language that isn't currently supported by Workplace, you can always download the SRT file, have captions translated, and upload the translated SRT file to a new video post.

üìπ For more feature videos you can view & download, visit the NEW **[Learning Videos page on the Customer Resource Center](https://www.workplace.com/resources/videos/features)**

# Feature suggestion - Alumni program

When colleagues move on from a business, or in particular retire, it can be a difficult transition to make. Leaving behind friends and colleagues of many years can be traumatic, especially in the current climate where people are feeling more isolated than ever due to the pandemic.

Workplace is a great social hub and I'd like to suggest the implementation of an Alumni program. Colleagues could be flagged as an Alumnus or Alumna of the company, which would then allow them to change their email address to a personal one, and restrict their access to an Alumni group (could be a flag set by an admin).

I appreciate this is not a solution that could be used for everyone, especially those moving on to competitors, but I feel the ability to restrict membership to one group would mitigate any potential leakage of commercially sensitive information and provide a great place to be able to keep in touch with former colleagues and friends.

I'm interested to hear thoughts or concerns you may have about this idea üòÄ

# Countdowns
